Package space.sunqian.common.base.date

Class DateKit

java.lang.Object
space.sunqian.common.base.date.DateKit
public class DateKit extends Object
Utilities for time and date. This class is backed by DateFormatter.defaultFormatter().

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final @Nonnull String
    DEFAULT_PATTERN
    Default format pattern: "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS".

      Returns:
